title: [Large-scale] Cohort-Based Expert Development: Active Learning Strategy (ALS) Implementation Process

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic instructional design skills and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in digital-collaboration environments, focusing on developing ALS (Active Learning Strategies) applicable to real-world tasks

learning_goals: By the end of the course, learners will be able to design at least three ALS techniques in a PBL environment
By the end of the course, learners will be able to produce effectiveness verification reports for ALS-applied projects through peer assessment
By the end of the course, learners will be able to propose at least five strategies to address organizational resistance expected when introducing ALS

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (MS Teams, Zoom, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
